node.title: A deep dive into the Java lambda expressions
node.excerpt: Lambda expressions are introduced in java8 version.Let us look about Lamda expressions in detail.

node.title: Cross-domain communication using window.postMessage()
node.excerpt: Learn how to communicate between two web pages of different origin.
